DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Safety Study MM-10-001 Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The drug substance study powder produce shiitake mushroom , contain beta-glucans . The purpose study evaluate safety increase dos MM-10-001 determine dose MM-10-001 enhance immune system normal healthy subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject gender , age > 45 year old eligible study . Subjects : 1 . Fail give write informed consent 2 . Have BMI equal 30 kg/m2 3 . Use corticosteroid ( include inhale steroid ) NSAIDs antiinflammatory drug 4 . Have uncontrolled hypertension ( sit diastolic blood pressure > 95 mmHg ) 5 . Have ongoing allergy history anaphylactic reaction 6 . Have ongoing allergen specific immunotherapy 7 . Are immunocompromised ( HIV infect , cancer disease affect basal immune response ) 8 . Have chronic inflammatory disease 9 . Have diabetes ( type 1 type 2 ) 10 . Have chronic severe renal disease ( creatinine outside normal range ) 11 . Have chronic severe liver disease ( ASAT and/or ALAT two time upper limit normal range ) 12 . Have know cardiac failure 13 . Have recently ( less 6 month ) experience myocardial infarction 14 . Have gastrointestinal disease ( chronic gastritis , IBD , etc . ) 15 . Have acute chronic pancreatitis impair pancreatic function , history pancreatitis 16 . Have vaccinate within last three month 17 . Eat diet supplement NG24 betaglucan 18 . Eat shiitake cheese 19 . Have systemic fungal infection 20 . Have clinical condition render unfit participate include known/suspected drug alcohol abuse 21 . Do fully understand content inform consent 22 . Pregnant lactate woman woman childbearing potential use adequate contraception .
